verbs.description: < p > There [V: is] [ARG1: a growing sense of frustration , bordering on incredulity ,] [ARGM-LOC: among President Trump 's European allies] [ARGM-TMP: following his recent actions in the Middle] East.</p >
< p > There is a [V: growing] [ARG1: sense] of frustration , bordering on incredulity , among President Trump 's European allies following his recent actions in the Middle East.</p >
< p > There is [ARG1: a growing sense of frustration] , [V: bordering] [ARG2: on incredulity] , among President Trump 's European allies following his recent actions in the Middle East.</p >
< p > There is a growing sense of frustration , bordering on incredulity , among President Trump 's European allies [V: following] [ARG2: his recent actions in the Middle] East.</p >
